name: Gogoat
description: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Grass Pelt
abilities.effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
abilities.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
